metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare powers the fastest, most immersive, and most reliable gaming experiences

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Gaming
relatedBlades.subtitle: Deliver responsive, reliable gaming experiences and streamline development everywhere
relatedBlades.copy:
With a massive global network and unified security platform, Cloudflare can help you sustain engaging, low-latency experiences while protecting servers from disruptive cyber attacks. 
Zero Trust capabilities give game developers and other dispersed team members simple, secure ways to access essential resources from anywhere.

relatedBlades.title: Stop attacks, improve player experiences, and drive innovation

columnContent.title: Protect game servers
columnContent.description: Strengthen game security while maintaining performance. Low-latency DDoS mitigation safeguards game servers without adding lag.

columnContent.title: Secure the matchmaking process
columnContent.description: Matching players and servers is critical for multiplayer games. Speed matches and avoid downtime caused by attacks.

columnContent.title: Empower global teams
columnContent.description: Easily integrate contractors and dispersed team members into development workflows. Provide simple, secure access to resources.

relatedBlades.heading: How Cloudflare delivers security and performance for gaming

content.value:
Gaming servers are frequent targets of DDoS attacks, which can bring gameplay to a screeching halt. Companies need to defend against disruptive attacks without slowing performance. 

The Cloudflare connectivity cloud offers best-in-class DDoS protection that can identify and mitigate attacks through any of our %{DataCenterCount}+ locations. Avoid game-ending interruptions while maintaining engaging experiences.

When gaming servers are located too far away, players experience slow load times and laggy performance.

Cloudflare's massive global network spans more than %{DataCenterCount} cities, operating within %{OperationMilliseconds} milliseconds of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent} of the Internet-connected population. Always in close proximity to servers, players can enjoy lightning-fast experiences from anywhere.
Optimize game performance and security by analyzing key metrics and service logs.
Monitor server health, spot latency trends, and understand threats—all in one place.
Use HTTP logs to pinpoint issues, adjust configs, and combine with game logs for full visibility.
Get insights on emerging threats and trends from aggregated Cloudflare network data.
Analyze sites privately; view hostnames, URLs, countries—no cookies. Check traffic spikes easily.

cards.title: Accelerate matchmaking
cards.description: Match players and servers faster while safeguarding this critical process for multiplayer gaming.

cards.title: Improve game availability
cards.description: Apply best-in-class DDoS protection from every data center within a massive global network. Prevent disruptive attacks without sacrificing game performance.

cards.title: Streamline global collaboration
cards.description: Give game developers, designers, testers, and other remote team members simple, secure access to essential apps and infrastructure without resorting to VPNs or other legacy tools.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: SYBO's Subway Surfers reaches a global audience with help from Cloudflare R2 and Argo Smart Routing

content.value:
Games from SYBO are played around the world. But until recently, growth was constrained by the company's cloud infrastructure. 

Cloudflare Argo Smart Routing eliminated the challenge of routing traffic between a global user base and the company's servers. Meanwhile, Cloudflare R2 and caching help SYBO deliver engaging experiences with exceptional performance while saving the company money.

"With Cloudflare R2 and caching, we can now serve up to a petabyte of monthly traffic and save around $60,000 each month. Cloudflare substantially expands our ability to experiment and enter new markets."
